title: Grade 10 - Technology and the Skilled Trades (2024)
subject: Technological Education

document.title: Grade 10 - Technology and the Skilled Trades (2024)

981AE79DBFB74B0A8EC3EBED7353B555.description: evaluate the transferable skills they are developing, identifying areas of strength and growth, and analyze how these skills relate to current and emerging careers in technological fields and the skilled trades

DE3E207F0FAF4E3C805CFED7CED395AA.description: compare a variety of pathways leading to careers in technological fields and the skilled trades, including their structure and the educational and financial requirements for them

866020D1C2B340B1B6D730F93D6F1564.description: research and identify programs, including in-school job skills programs and community-based programs, related to pathways and careers in technological fields and the skilled trades

E221830A307F41F584DF0F6810641AA6.description: explore a variety of roles, responsibilities, and opportunities related to current and emerging careers in technological fields, including a variety of broad-based technology areas, and the skilled trades

F6D59DCC16A6456391E9915A36A83FE1.description: Careers and Pathways in Technology and the Skilled Trades. Explore and describe careers in technological fields and the skilled trades, and pathways for entering them

4400E55CF6A84D0A92A4EB00FE3EC32D.description: evaluate how positive and negative impacts of various technologies can influence technological evolution, including emerging technologies

C98484BAC6A948E6B3818D150F2CBF01.description: assess local and global impacts of various technological innovations on the environment and the economy, including the labour market

FE343830670049C49A1F58BE7F4B83DD.description: assess short-term and long-term impacts of various technological innovations on individuals and society, including the impact on their everyday life, and propose ways to mitigate negative impacts and enhance positive ones

7F26FBE65E84429F885DE9DC7FD03B18.description: Impacts of Technology. Analyze impacts of various technologies on individuals, society, the economy, and the environment

A8E321B328E54A829D55DD088429BF02.description: describe ways in which diverse communities, including First Nations, Métis, and Inuit, have drawn on various knowledge systems to find innovative approaches to technological problem solving

9D1E6A55714B4D54837799FC6311DF2A.description: investigate and describe contributions to technological innovations made by Canadians, including women, and members of diverse groups and communities in Canada, including First Nations, Métis, and Inuit

8D35696C56D5494088BD31086F4CFDE2.description: analyze how the development and application of technologies are impacted by legal, ethical, social, economic, and environmental considerations

C1620EDD482C48678345B0533FBB1725.description: assess interrelationships between user needs and the development of various technological solutions

89A400D1F3184819910DBA72802F7D10.description: Fundamentals of Technological Development. Demonstrate an understanding of how various needs and underlying social, economic, and environmental factors drive the evolution of technology

1AA19B30827A49E0909C98A7BD320AC7.description: demonstrate a safety mindset by making safety a priority at all times and by engaging in industry-specific safety procedures

4F819727DE7C45DCA33F0EDD5487799A.description: follow proper procedures for the safe handling, storage, and disposal of materials and waste products

80162D95C0FD4633939B78C2D9F9168F.description: follow practices that support physical and mental health and well-being

19E4268929DC439F89D7D03B3E686A73.description: use tools and equipment safely, including using personal protective equipment and safety devices according to safety standards and regulations, as appropriate

3962DB7340DF41848925DF8B7589C037.description: identify hazards in their environment, and apply strategies to minimize risks

DA4A175BBEA64D8B8E8BDA78591CDB37.description: describe relevant health and safety regulations for a variety of settings, including mandated roles and responsibilities

1495DD36E3094C4082DEE56CCB10FB9A.description: Applying Health and Safety Principles. Apply an understanding of health and safety practices and procedures when using materials, tools, and equipment

284BC396BD31422C96EB5D7CEF68F9BE.description: communicate project-related challenges, performance analyses, and refinements for a specific audience, using appropriate formats and terminology

6EC48866CFA743B496DE9F590B4B822A.description: refine the design of products and/or services based on an analysis of data collected throughout the development process

5BACA93415C84C728148D1F5F7A2A24F.description: analyze the performance of products and/or service delivery using quality control methods

CE7DC6B34E4E49DD9F752F3CD82CB1A4.description: identify various industry-relevant performance standards and quality control methods

F390CEF922404D04A298CAEC12382D65.description: identify challenges they encounter in the process of developing their projects and apply critical thinking skills to address these challenges and minimize the probability of their reoccurrence

9CD797A786A74D229F7BD938165CB804.description: Analyzing and Refining. Evaluate and refine processes, products, and/or services

E030A7E3BF3E42D19C692EEDFBB32A91.description: select appropriate units of measure and tools to make accurate measurements using relevant measurement systems, such as the metric and imperial systems, and converting between systems and units

551EE9DE85F44FCBA4D796DFF183953B.description: create products and/or deliver services, documenting their development process using appropriate industry terminology

07598DC81D6F4AFCBEE6C880C52C1846.description: use a variety of industry-related documents to guide the creation of products and/or the delivery of services as part of their projects

E8794A858EE94D0CA897AB1BD3499D28.description: select, use, and maintain tools and equipment appropriately as part of creating products and/or delivering services

7432666FB1F042C59337C4503861E24D.description: select materials and other resources based on their properties or characteristics, including sustainability, and justify their use in the creation of products and/or services

F30D9C361CD04E7EAB859E1B56B43E2C.description: identify factors that could impact the development of their projects and apply appropriate strategies to increase the probability of a positive outcome

A1D97DC83487496393CAD801315E5516.description: use project management skills to develop a process to create a product and/or service

2B8E8D5D5CA54F2AB2FB8790A4A7335E.description: Designing and Performing. Develop projects that involve creating products and/or services, using a variety of resources and techniques, and record the development of their projects

45D1DC721FFA428CAACA016289680B5B.description: collect and synthesize information from a variety of sources, including people with diverse perspectives and from various communities, such as First Nations, Métis, and Inuit, to inform their projects

4D5BBF31F6F5415AB8042295F1280B67.description: investigate and describe project management skills and approaches that are relevant to developing products and/or services, and explain how they will use these skills in their own projects

C2B327B088754D5C82CAC24915EA595D.description: establish and justify evaluation criteria for products and/or services being developed, including both qualitative and quantitative measures, making connections to relevant fundamental technological concepts

E8399448639E4BB49CFB1A9D7365F48C.description: communicate design ideas for various purposes and audiences, using appropriate industry terminology and industry-standard formats and techniques

9D8EFC89DD3C4EE9889EF7BF7D9CBB56.description: investigate design considerations, including accessibility requirements, that are relevant to developing projects, and identify those that are essential to various users or communities

A79ED3F76CBE44729C60799373E2C801.description: apply an understanding of fundamental technological concepts, design considerations, and science, technology, engineering, and mathematics (STEM) concepts as appropriate in developing projects involving the creation of products and/or services

66FD8A575FD4470EB6F7701990E9C1DF.description: apply an understanding of fundamental technological concepts, and evaluate their significance in developing products and/or services in a variety of broad-based technology areas

ADE5CCE6A7D7465EAC132BE625101A63.description: Initiating and Planning. Demonstrate an understanding of fundamental technological concepts and related skills by initiating and planning projects
